verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Take my life, and let it be
Consecrated, Lord, to Thee;
Take my moments and my days,
(Let them flow in ceaseless praise). x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Take me, Lord, my love,
my Saviour,
(mould me 'till I live in you). x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Take my hands, O Lord above,
fill each movement with your love.
Take my feet, and let them be,
always striding, Lord, to thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Take my voice, and let me sing
always, only, for my King;
Take my lips, and let them be
(Always giving praise thee). x2

verse.name: v4
